text: Caldwell is a small village in south Derbyshire, EnglandCaldwell.org.uk accessed 3 January 2008 within the National Forest and in the parish of Cauldwell. At the 2011 census, the population is listed under the civil parish of Drakelow. ==References== ==External links== * Caldwell.org.uk accessed 3 January 2008 Category:Villages in Derbyshire Category:South Derbyshire District
title: Caldwell, Derbyshire
